notes.title: üßπ Clean Core Migration Checklist
notes.content:
=== Phase 1: Assessment ===
‚úì Run Clean Core Checker (/SDF/CD_CBA)
‚úì Classify custom code: Keep/Replace/Rebuild
‚úì Identify top 20 critical customizations

=== Phase 2: BTP Setup ===
‚úì Create BTP subaccount
‚úì Enable Cloud Foundry runtime
‚úì Configure destinations to S/4HANA

=== Phase 3: Migration ===
‚úì Rebuild top 20 on BTP (side-by-side)
‚úì Test in DEV environment
‚úì Migrate data
‚úì Go-live on PROD

=== Key Resources ===
‚Ä¢ Clean Core Guide: https://help.sap.com/cleancore
‚Ä¢ BTP Best Practices: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap

3456789 - API Business Hub Overview

=== Development Environment ===

=== Production Environment ===

=== Migration Decision ===

=== Top 20 Critical Programs ===
1. [CUSTOMIZE: Program name] - [Business function]
2. [CUSTOMIZE: Program name] - [Business function]
...

Run transaction /SDF/CD_CBA for full analysis

instructions:
üìã CUSTOMIZATION INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Replace [CUSTOMIZE] placeholders with your project-specific values
2. Update environment hostnames with actual tenant URLs
3. Add project-specific OSS notes
4. Update test user credentials (never commit to Git!)
5. Import into SF Pro Toolkit: Settings ‚Üí Import JSON
6. Creates a custom profile: 'Clean Core S/4HANA Migration'

‚ö†Ô∏è Security: This template includes placeholder credentials. Always use real credentials securely.
